text: Hi Manmeet - apologies I haven't  been in touch - a combination of work and feeling poorly with flu. I am back and happy to help
Ok - I think I need to start with , what do you like doing , what fires your passion , gives you a warm glow and a sense of accomplishment .

Its' good that you so the Btec too as having some qualifications is at least better than none - it's not the be all and end all as you know but it gives you some insight I guess and helps maybe for you to decide what path you prefer.

I had no clue as to what I wanted to do when I was your age - but I know I liked studying . Finance is as good a place as any. Starting with finance there are so many avenues , Finance, Banking, Insurance, Accounting, Auditing,  to name a few. Yes Iwould like to hear about your event and how you budget and forecast and review performance good or bad.
